name: thatsmartsite
description: That Smart Site - Smart websites for smart businesses

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev" "node scripts/error-monitor/index.js --target=all"
scripts.dev:all: npm run predev:all && concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c cyan,yellow "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && cd frontend && npm run lint
scripts.deploy:build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run migrate
